con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="IBNDC-41nn Genera reservas"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="IBNDC-4171 AC008.7.4"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script: /* * XML: * - getCoreQuery_XML * - getPreferences_XML * - getDataLists_XML */ import groovy.json.JsonSlurper class LIB_AirShoppingXMLs { //XMLs def coreQuery_XML = """ [ORIGINDESTINATIONS] """ def originDestinations_XML = """ [ORIGINCITY] [DATE] [DESTINATIONCITY] """ def preference_XML = """ [FAREPREFERENCES] [NUMMAX] [CHEAPEST] [CABIN] """ def farePreferences_XML = """ [PRIVATEFARE] [DISCOUNTS] """ def types_XML = """ 758 """ def ticketDesig_XML = """[ITEM]""" def ticketDesigs_XML = """ [TICKETDESIG] """ def flightPreferences_XML = """ [ITEM] """ def pricingMethodPreferences_XML = """ [ITEM] """ def cabinPreferences_XML = """ [ITEM] """ def dataLists_XML = """ [PASSENGER] """ def passenger_XML = """ [PTC] """ def public testRunner, context, logger def LIB_AirShoppingXMLs ( whichTestRunner, whichContext, whichLogger ){ this.logger = whichLogger this.context = whichContext this.testRunner = whichTestRunner } //Devuelve XML de CoreQuery def getCoreQuery_XML( citiesLst, date, cntx_SF ) { logger.info ':: RUNNING -> //Libs/LIB_AirShopping XMLs/getCoreQuery_XML' citiesLst = citiesLst.split(',') def numCities = citiesLst.size() def numSegments = (numCities/2).toInteger() def arrayDates = [] assert numCities%2 == 0, " ERROR: comprobar que el número de ciudades introducido en citiesLst es par. Número de ciudades -> $numCities" def aux = '' def city = '' def nextCity = '' arrayDates = cntx_SF.getDates( numSegments, date ) (0..(numCities-1)).eachWithIndex() { item, index -> if ( index%2 == 0 ) { city = citiesLst[index] nextCity = citiesLst[index+1] aux = aux + originDestinations_XML.replace( '[ORIGINCITY]', city ) .replace( '[DATE]', arrayDates[(index/2).toInteger()] ) .replace( '[DESTINATIONCITY]', nextCity ) } } coreQuery_XML = coreQuery_XML.replace( '[ORIGINDESTINATIONS]', aux ) return coreQuery_XML } //Devuelve XML de Preferences def getPreferences_XML( pF, rD, lF, sN, ch, cP ) { logger.info ':: RUNNING -> //Libs/LIB_AirShopping XMLs/getPreferences_XML' def lst_xml = [] lst_xml << types_XML lst_xml << ticketDesig_XML lst_xml << ticketDesig_XML lst_xml << flightPreferences_XML lst_xml << pricingMethodPreferences_XML lst_xml << cabinPreferences_XML def lst_items = [ pF, rD, lF, sN, ch, cP ] def aux = '' def auxFarePreferences = '' def auxTicketDesigs = '' def auxCH = ch switch ( auxCH.toUpperCase() ) { case ['1', 'FIRST']: ch = '1' break case ['2', 'BUSINESS']: ch = '2' break case ['4', 'PREMIUM TOURIST']: ch = '4' break case ['5', 'ECONOMY']: ch = '1' break case ['NO', '']: ch = 'NO' break default: ch = 'NO' logger.warn " WARNING: cabinPreference ha sido modificado a NO. Si no es la opción deseada revisa la propiedad cabinPreference en las propiedades" break } lst_items.eachWithIndex() { item, index -> if ( null == item || 'NO' == item ) { lst_xml[index] = '' } else { lst_xml[index] = lst_xml[index].replace( '[ITEM]', item ) } } if ( '' != lst_xml[1] ) { auxTicketDesigs = auxTicketDesigs + lst_xml[1] } if ( '' != lst_xml[2] ) { auxTicketDesigs = auxTicketDesigs + lst_xml[2] } if ( '' != auxTicketDesigs ) { ticketDesigs_XML = ticketDesigs_XML.replace( '[TICKETDESIG]', auxTicketDesigs ) } else { ticketDesigs_XML = '' } if ( '' == lst_xml[0] && '' == ticketDesigs_XML ) { farePreferences_XML = '' } else { farePreferences_XML = farePreferences_XML.replace( '[PRIVATEFARE]', lst_xml[0] ) farePreferences_XML = farePreferences_XML.replace( '[DISCOUNTS]', ticketDesigs_XML ) } if ( '' == farePreferences_XML && '' == lst_xml[3] && '' == lst_xml[4] && '' == lst_xml[5] ) { preference_XML = '' } else { preference_XML = preference_XML.replace( '[FAREPREFERENCES]', farePreferences_XML ) .replace( '[NUMMAX]' , lst_xml[3] ) .replace( '[CHEAPEST]' , lst_xml[4] ) .replace( '[CABIN]' , lst_xml[5] ) } return preference_XML } //Devuelve XML de Preferences def getDataLists_XML( nADT, nCHD, nINF ) { logger.info ':: RUNNING -> //Libs/LIB_AirShopping XMLs/getDataLists_XML' nADT = nADT.toInteger() nCHD = nCHD.toInteger() nINF = nINF.toInteger() def auxPassenger = '' if ( 0 != nADT ) { (1..nADT).each(){ index -> def id = 'ADULT_0' + index.toString() auxPassenger = auxPassenger + passenger_XML.replace( '[ID]' , id ) .replace( '[PTC]' , 'ADT' ) } } if ( 0 != nCHD ) { (1..nCHD).each(){ index -> def id = 'CHILD_0' + index.toString() auxPassenger = auxPassenger + passenger_XML.replace( '[ID]' , id ) .replace( '[PTC]' , 'CHD' ) } } if ( 0 != nINF ) { (1..nINF).each(){ index -> def id = 'INFANT_0' + index.toString() auxPassenger = auxPassenger + passenger_XML.replace( '[ID]' , id ) .replace( '[PTC]' , 'INF' ) } } dataLists_XML = dataLists_XML.replace( '[PASSENGER]', auxPassenger ) return dataLists_XML } } final objName = "cntx_ASXML" context.setProperty( objName, new LIB_AirShoppingXMLs ( testRunner, context, log) )

// ENDPOINTS VÁLIDOS PARA ENTORNOS DEV, UAT, BETA, PRE y PRO //######### Versión 16 ######### // CON MASHERY.............................................
def lst_v16_UAT_MASHERY_YES = """ { "AirShopping" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/AirShopping/v1" , "FlightPrice" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/FlightPrice/v2" , "OrderCreate" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/OrderCreate/v2" , "AirDocIssue" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/AirDocIssue/v2" , "OrderChange" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/OrderChange/v2" , "BaggageList" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/BaggageAvailability/v1" , "SeatAvailability": "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/SeatAvailability/v1" , "OrderList" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/OrderList/v2" , "OrderCancel" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/OrderCancel/v2" , "ItinReshop" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/ItinReshop/v2" , "OrderRetrieve" : "https://test.api.iberia.com/iberia/[ENVIRONMENT]/ndc/OrderRetrieve/v2" , "OfferPrice" : "N/A" , "ServiceList" : "N/A" , "OrderReshop" : "N/A" } """

// SIN MASHERY.............................................
def lst_v16_UAT_MASHERY_NO = """ { } """
